title: Ejercicios: Financiación y Análisis de Riesgo

items.prompt: Raising capital by selling shares is called ___ financing.
items.explanation: Equity financing involves selling ownership in the company.

items.prompt: We ___ meet the board of directors tomorrow morning.
items.explanation: Use 'are going to' for fixed plans.

items.prompt: The bank needs ___ to secure the loan.
items.explanation: Collateral is security provided for a loan.

items.prompt: I think the stock market ___ recover quickly.
If a company can pay its debts, it has high ___.
items.explanation: Creditworthiness is the measure of a borrower's ability to pay back.
